summary: Diplomatic breakthroughs, mega-compute bets, and widening recognition of Palestine during a volatile month.

events.details: International genocide scholars declare Israel's Gaza campaign a genocide.
US-brokered preliminary peace agreement aims to end the eastern DRC proxy war.
OpenAI and Nvidia announce $100B partnership for 10 GW AI compute infrastructure.
UK, Canada, Australia, and France formally recognize Palestinian statehood.
Gen Z-led protests force PM K.P. Sharma Oli to resign after dozens killed.
US 20-point ceasefire plan accepted by both Israel and Hamas.
